idea-plugin.name: Resources Hard-code Optimize Util
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin can generate the resource code in strings.xml and colors.xml automatically after optimizing the hard codes of strings and colors in res folder.
Advice: backup your code before use. 对老项目中的string和color等硬编码快捷的添加到strings.xml和colors.xml文件中. 建议：使用前先备份代码.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
V1.0: 首次发布工具 Src hard code optimize util.
